member.name: T:Itron.Metering.ReplicaSettings.FunctionKeyAssignment
member.summary: The FunctionKeyAssignment class represents the 'KeyHandler' tag in the user interface definition file. For each possible menu item (function key) it identifies the key's label, the logic that should be exercised when the key is pressed, and the next menu that should be displayed after it is pressed

member.name: T:Itron.Metering.ReplicaSettings.UIDefinitionFile
member.summary:
The UIDefinitionFile represents that XML file that describes the menu structure to be used in the calling application. The menu structure is defined using the following tags: Submenu - used to identify each menu structure DefaultKey - used to identify the keyhandler that should be executed when the submenu is initially displayed KeyHandler - used to define each function key that is included in the submenu
The UIDefinitionFile will be located in the application's data directory

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.ReplicaSettings.UIDefinitionFile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: This constructor opens the UIDefinition file and caches the list of submenu nodes.

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.ReplicaSettings.UIDefinitionFile.ReadMenu(System.Int32,System.String@,System.Collections.Generic.List{Itron.Metering.ReplicaSettings.FunctionKeyAssignment}@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: This method is used to read the complete definition of a submeny from the UI Definition file. Note that the starting menuID will always be defined as 1.
member.param: The ID of the menu to read.
The title of the menu.
The assignments for keys in the menu.
The default key that should be pressed when keys are loaded.
member.returns: Whether or not the menu was read.

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.ReplicaSettings.UIDefinitionFile.IsMenuSpecial(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the menu ID is special.
member.param: The ID of the menu to check
member.returns: Whether or not menu is special

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.ReplicaSettings.UIDefinitionFile.ReadSpecialMenu(System.Int32,System.String@,System.Collections.Generic.List{Itron.Metering.ReplicaSettings.FunctionKeyAssignment}@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: This method is used when the definition of a submenu from the UI Definition file is being subverted and this new menu structure will take its place.
member.param: The ID of the menu to read.
The title of the menu.
The assignments for keys in the menu.
The default key that should be pressed when keys are loaded.
member.returns: Whether or not the menu was read.
